DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see vitamin D supplementation improve muscle function .
DOC.detailed_description: This study 12-month , double-blind randomize placebo control trial 200 older ( 65-89 yr ) men woman initial 25 ( OH ) D concentration 18- < 30 ng/mL determine effect increase 25 ( OH ) D concentration ≥30 ng/mL vitamin D3 supplementation 1 ) change neuromuscular function establish risk-factors fall old adult ; 2 ) change underlie physiological mechanism 4 month subset 40 randomly select participant . Participants randomized 2000 IU/d vitamin D3 placebo . Lower extremity muscle strength power , physical performance , postural sway assess baseline , 4 month 12 month fall assess monthly . Muscle biopsy vastus lateralis take baseline 4 month assess muscle fiber type , contractility , denervation , number differentiation stage satellite cell .
